item.description:
let's meetup at johnny d's in somerville and dance ourselves down to sweaty little nubs while booty vortex brings the funk and disco.

booty vortex is a 13 piece band that will definitely get you to "shake what yo mama gave ya". for more info on the band, see their website: http://www.bootyvorte...

we've always had a fantastic time at booty's shows.

details:

the cover charge for this show is $10.

if you come to the show, please text or call me to find me, preferably text. i do wander around and look for folks (so it really helps if you posted a good picture of yourself), but texting me is the way to find me.

if you're driving to the show, note that there are street parking spots, but they may be difficult to find. johnny d's has a good city parking map here: http://www.johnnyds.c...

if you're taking the T, the Davis Square Red Line stop is directly across the street from johnny d's.

johnny d's website: http://www.johnnyds.c...
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to all 'Yes' and 'Maybe' RSVPers on saturday morning
item.name: Booty Vortex @ Johnny D's
